text:
whoever implemented this: <https://spin.d.pr/iqz4tH+> you are amazing :star2:. now please add this so we can use this as a field in custom modules.

I create this interface manually currently and it just seems like something that should be possible as it’s own field type in custom modules.
This is so close to an exact group of fields I created that I had to go double-check that it wasn’t me
haha, yea I did this almost exactly myself probably 5 different times so far and will probably do it again until this is done as 1 field
The naming on mine was different and I had additional fields that popped up for email subject body address etc.
But otherwise I was like… HOWD YOU GET INTO MY PORTALZZ
haha - what’d you think that chrome extension is for? kidding
for context this was in the rich text editor field within the design manager
I've asked multiple times for this and even given this as an example so that we don't have to rebuild it every time. :crossed_fingers::skin-tone-3:
